hero.headline: Connect global events with Czech and Slovak audiences
hero.intro: AJSEE¬Æ is a new project making it easy and secure for Czech and Slovak fans to buy tickets for international concerts, festivals and sports events. We are currently looking for partners and ticket providers worldwide.
hero.imageAlt: Illustration: global events connected with Czech and Slovak fans.
section-events-subtitle: Get tickets for the best cultural experiences near you.
feature1-desc: Your tickets are always verified and original.
feature2-desc: We communicate in Czech and handle everything for you.
feature3-desc: Only the best events and partners.
partners-cta: I want to become a partner
contact-success-msg: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact-error-msg: Submission failed. Please try again later.
contact-error-email: Please enter a valid email address.
about-text: AJSEE¬Æ was born from the need to travel for culture without stress or unnecessary barriers. We‚Äôre building a platform that opens the door to concerts, festivals, theatre and sports ‚Äî at home and abroad.
about-hero-text: Experiences have no borders. And that‚Äôs exactly why AJSEE was born.
about-hero-subtext: Our goal is to make cultural, entertainment and sports events from around the world accessible ‚Äì clearly, intuitively, and without unnecessary barriers when choosing and buying tickets.
about-hero-claim: AJSEE<sup>¬Æ</sup> is a modern platform for everyone who wants to experience the world ‚Äì without limits.
about-value-1: Openness ‚Äì We make world experiences accessible to all.
about-value-3: Innovation ‚Äì We follow trends, curate the best events and technologies.
about-story-p1: It was autumn 2024. We were sitting in a pub, had a beer ‚Äî and as it often happens, an ordinary chat sparked something that soon turned into a real idea.
about-story-p2: That very evening, the name AJSEE was born, along with the first logo draft and a vision: to make world experiences accessible without language barriers.
about-story-p3: But then came the hardest phase: to actually start.
about-story-p4: We both had full-time jobs, lived 180 kilometres apart, and time was scarce. The project paused for a while before it really took off.
about-story-p5: Then one day, one of us simply launched it. Without a perfect plan, but with the certainty that it made sense.
about-story-p6: And that‚Äôs when AJSEE started becoming reality.
about-future-p1: By the end of 2025, we want to launch the production version of the website.
about-future-p2: We‚Äôre expanding language versions and building partnerships with international platforms.
about-future-p3: We‚Äôre preparing a mobile app and expanding the selection of events ‚Äî and their availability for a wider audience.
about-future-p4: We want AJSEE to be the first choice for anyone looking for a path to world-class experiences ‚Äî whether in London, Barcelona, or at home in Brno.
event-demo-badge: Sample events ‚Äì real ticket sales coming soon. Stay tuned!
events-hero-desc: Discover concerts, festivals, theatre and sports in one clear catalogue.
events-load-error: Events could not be loaded. Please try again later.
thankyou-title: Thank you for your message | AJSEE
thankyou-message:
Your message has been sent.
We will get back to you soon.
about-timeline-2024: The first ideas for creating the AJSEE¬Æ platform. The vision to connect the cultural world without language barriers is born.
about-timeline-2025: Start of programming and development of the multilingual AJSEE¬Æ website.
about-timeline-2025-07-01: Launch of the AJSEE¬Æ website test run. The website is opened to the public for the first time and we collect the first feedback from visitors.
about-team-adam-claim: Adam Br√°zda is the person behind AJSEE¬Æ. From the first ideas to the website launch, he leads the project with the vision to connect the world of culture without barriers.
about-team-jan-claim: From day one, Jan has shared the vision of making culture and experiences more accessible to everyone ‚Äî without unnecessary barriers.
about-cta-headline: Want to be part of it?
about-cta-text: AJSEE¬Æ is open to collaboration, ideas and new partnerships. If our mission has caught your interest, write to us ‚Äì we look forward to hearing from you!
blog-lead: Read reviews of cultural events and discover tips for the best experiences around the world.
faq-a1: AJSEE is a modern platform for tickets to culture, sports, and concerts, designed for users and partners.
faq-q2: How many languages does AJSEE support?
faq-a2: AJSEE is fully localized in 6 languages: Czech, English, German, Slovak, Polish, and Hungarian.
faq-a3: Registration and event browsing are free, you only pay for tickets.
faq-q4: How can I become an AJSEE partner?
faq-a4: Just fill out the form on the Partners page and we will contact you.
